# readIndices(using:)

**Instance Method**

Retrieves the Metal index buffer for GPU reading.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func readIndices(using commandBuffer: any MTLCommandBuffer) -> any MTLBuffer
```

## Parameters

- **commandBuffer**: The [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLCommandBuffer] you intend to use for reading. RealityKit waits for the command buffer to complete before discarding the buffer.

## Accessing mesh data on the GPU with Metal

- **read(bufferIndex:using:)**: Retrieves a Metal vertex buffer at the specified index, for GPU reading.
- **replace(bufferIndex:using:)**: Retrieves a Metal vertex buffer you can use to replace the contents of the specified buffer on the GPU using Metal.
- **replaceIndices(using:)**: Retrieves a Metal index buffer that you can use to replace the indices of this low-level mesh.
